title: Introduction to Python
questions: How can I run Python programs?
objectives: Learn the fundamentals of programming in Python
key_points: Python is a fairly easy programming language to learn and use, but be mindful of the indexing.
Python has many libraries offering a variety of capabilities, which makes it popular for beginners, as well as, more experienced users
